==Pictures== *[http://meson.ad-l.ink/6VbC2Dxb4/image.png PCB top] *[http://rghost.ru/8fQgcPxDN/image.png PCB bottom] ==See also== *[[Beeline SmartBox]] N300 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197D @660MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO *[[Beeline SmartBox One]] v1 N600 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL @700MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO :WLAN 5GHz: 802.11an 2х2 MIMO *[[Beeline SmartBox One v2]] AC1200 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL @700MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO :WLAN 5GHz: 802.11an/ac 2х2 MIMO *[[Beeline SmartBox Pro]] AC1200 Wireless Router :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz :Flash: 256MB, RAM: 256MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO :WLAN 5GHz: 802.11an/ac 2х2 MIMO [[Category:English Documentation]]
